response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe has immense value and could significantly benefit your business. After careful consideration and assessment of its worth, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or if you have any questions about the product. We look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
